markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs=""
>
[Ventriloquist's Ring](/Equipment.aspx?ID=468)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 617 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This elegant copper ring has miniature images of songbirds engraved around its circumference. You gain a +1 item bonus to Deception checks.

<document level="2" id="action-280" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Ventriloquist's Ring
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 617 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 60 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>
Ventriloquist's Ring (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 617 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 670 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The ring grants a +2 bonus. When you activate the ring, you gain the effects of 2nd-level _ventriloquism_ (DC 27). You can activate the ring any number of times per day.
name: Ventriloquist's Ring (Greater)
